citations.narrative:
Two ducks' enclosure did not have an area to wade/swim, although representatives noted a pool is added as enrichment
on certain days as part of the enrichment schedule. Access to a pool/aquatic area is a special space requirement for
wading and aquatic birds and helps permit species typical-behavior. Ensure that the ducks' enclosure has an aquatic area
that allows each bird to make normal postural and social adjustments.
***The facility corrected this item prior to report delivery on 12/8/2025; ensure to maintain correct from 12/8/2025 forward.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representatives.
n
